forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High around 55F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness after midnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 44F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.
